issue.body:

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.google.co.kr/search?q=%EC%95%84%EB%A5%B4%EB%A7%88%ED%83%80&source=hp&ei=MgkpY4awH4i8mAW2paGYCw&iflsig=AJiK0e8AAAAAYykXQnCAC2l8BKSKG-Qo9xKJOumQW8Lv&ved=0ahUKEwiGkdzEjqL6AhUIHqYKHbZSCLMQ4dUDCAk&uact=5&oq=%EC%95%84%EB%A5%B4%EB%A7%88%ED%83%80&gs_&sclient=gws-wiz](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.co.kr%2Fsearch%3Fq%3D%25EC%2595%2584%25EB%25A5%25B4%25EB%25A7%2588%25ED%2583%2580%26source%3Dhp%26ei%3DMgkpY4awH4i8mAW2paGYCw%26iflsig%3DAJiK0e8AAAAAYykXQnCAC2l8BKSKG-Qo9xKJOumQW8Lv%26ved%3D0ahUKEwiGkdzEjqL6AhUIHqYKHbZSCLMQ4dUDCAk%26uact%3D5%26oq%3D%25EC%2595%2584%25EB%25A5%25B4%25EB%25A7%2588%25ED%2583%2580%26gs_lcp%%26sclient%3Dgws-wiz) ### Comment > 사진에 첨부된 검색어 뿐만이 아니라 몇몇 정상적인 키워드들도 배치 순서 ex) A B (검색 안됨.) , B A (검색됨.) 를 바꾸면 검색이 되는경우도 있습니다. 물론 2가지 경우 모두 애드가드를 비활성화 하게 되면 문제없이 검색이 잘 됩니다. ### Screenshots

issue.title: www.forbes.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.forbes.com/sites/jacquelynsmith/2013/09/18/the-top-100-websites-for-your-career/?sh=3a7d49302a02](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.forbes.com%2Fsites%2Fjacquelynsmith%2F2013%2F09%2F18%2Fthe-top-100-websites-for-your-career%2F%3Fsh%3D3a7d49302a02) ### Comment Username: @planet0 > Two annoyances: > - 'New!' popup when scrolling down and scrolling back up. > - Overlay popup when mouse cursor is moved away from the browser window content. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/0WFva22.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/4cGW2Wx.png)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://reports-img.adguard.com/7LXZtgo.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.8.1.1147+release Browser: | Safari Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Block third-party Authorization header,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Disable cache for third-party requests,
Block WebRTC,
Block Push API,
